## 常用的数据类型
| Steps               | 数据格式         | 软件        |
|---------------------|------------------|-------------|
| QC                  | fastq            | Trimommatic |
| Mapping             | bam / sam        | samtools    |
| Peak calling        | narrowPeak bed   | Linux shell |
| Coverage generation | bedgraph, bigwig | deepTools   |
